paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant Arg56Gln, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: frequent syncopal episodes and an attack of ventricular tachycardia followed by ventricular fibrillation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 16-year-old-woman with QT prolongation on ECG had frequent syncopal episodes and an attack of ventricular tachycardia followed by ventricular fibrillation.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQTS but did not have symptoms

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Her older sister had an episode of syncope.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with a severe phenotype of LQTS.

variants.segregation_data: The KCNH2 mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The paper discusses compound mutations but focuses on KCNH2.
key_quotes: Compound mutations in different LQTS-related genes are likely to modify clinical characteristics.
Her older sister had an episode of syncope, but her mother did not.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
